title: Lynda - User Experience Fundamentals for Web Design
description:
Lynda - User Experience Fundamentals for Web Design

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 49m Beginner Dec 24, 2015   | Uploaded in Jan 4, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Author: Chris Nodder 

A good user experience design will make visitors stay on your site. A bad one will make them go to someone else's. This class teaches you how to apply simple UX design principles to your site to make it behave in the way that users want and expect.â€¨â€¨User experience expert Chris Nodder teachesâ€¨
	â€¢	What people want from websites, how they search for information, how they read online, and how to structure your content to take advantage of this research
	â€¢	How to use graphics to help rather than hinder visitors, how to integrate video, audio, and other media, and when to consider interactive rather than static content
	â€¢	How to look at your site's homepage, forms, product pages, and content through the eyes of users to build a site that better meets their needs
	â€¢	How to balance site content with advertising


There are never enough great interfaces in the world. Take this easy introduction to start making wonderful online experiences for your own users.

Topics include:
	â€¢	Building a site visitors will like
	â€¢	Using single, consistent, and standard design principles
	â€¢	Creating good menus
	â€¢	Working with site maps
	â€¢	Adding search to a site
	â€¢	Arranging content in a layout
	â€¢	Writing for the web
	â€¢	Creating category pages and landing pages
	â€¢	Designing product pages and forms
	â€¢	Using media and interactive content
	â€¢	Balancing ads and content
